01.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?title WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?work lrmoo:R3_is_realised_in ?expression ; crm:P102_has_title ?title_uri . ?title_uri crm:P2_has_type aat:300417207; crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?title. FILTER( lang(?title) = "en")}

02.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?label WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item ; crm:P2_has_type ?type . ?type rdfs:label ?label . FILTER( lang(?label) = "en")}

03.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?label WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P32_used_general_technique ?technique . ?technique rdfs:label ?label . FILTER( lang(?label) = "en")}

04.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT REPLACE(STR(?label), "_", " "); SEPARATOR="; " ) AS ?subjects) WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation ; crm:P129_is_about ?subject . ?subject crm:P1_is_identified_by ?sub_app . ?sub_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?label . FILTER(LANG(?label) = "en")} GROUP BY ?item

05.query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX edtf: <http://id.loc.gov/datatypes/edtf/> SELECT ?item ?date WHERE { VALUES ?item { <<<uri1>>> } ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P4_has_time-span ?timespan . ?timespan crm:P82a_begin_of_the_begin ?begin ; crm:P82b_end_of_the_end ?end . BIND(DATATYPE(?begin) AS ?beginDT) BIND(DATATYPE(?end) AS ?endDT) BIND(IF(?beginDT IN (xsd:dateTime, xsd:date), YEAR(?begin), xsd:integer(xsd:decimal(REPLACE(STR(?begin), "^Y?(-?\\d+).*$", "$1")))) AS ?beginYear) BIND(IF(?endDT IN (xsd:dateTime, xsd:date), YEAR(?end), xsd:integer(xsd:decimal(REPLACE(STR(?end), "^Y?(-?\\d+).*$", "$1")))) AS ?endYear) BIND(xsd:integer(xsd:decimal(?beginYear)) AS ?beginYearN) BIND(xsd:integer(xsd:decimal(?endYear)) AS ?endYearN) BIND(IF(?beginYearN < 0, CONCAT(STR(ABS(?beginYearN)), " BCE"), CONCAT(STR(?beginYearN), " CE")) AS ?beginLabel) BIND(IF(?endYearN < 0, CONCAT(STR(ABS(?endYearN)), " BCE"), CONCAT(STR(?endYearN), " CE")) AS ?endLabel) BIND(IF(?beginYearN = ?endYearN, ?beginLabel, CONCAT(?beginLabel, " \u2013 ", ?endLabel)) AS ?date) }

06.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT distinct ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300404387 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name) FILTER( LANG(?actor_name) = "en" || LANG(?actor_name) = "" )}

07.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300404386 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name) FILTER( LANG(?actor_name) = "en" || LANG(?actor_name) = "" )}

08.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300053225 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name) FILTER( LANG(?actor_name) = "en" || LANG(?actor_name) = "" )}

09.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300054686 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name) FILTER( LANG(?actor_name) = "en" || LANG(?actor_name) = "" )}

10.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?actor_name WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P9_consists_of ?activities . ?activities crm:P2_has_type aat:300417639 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor crm:P1_is_identified_by ?actor_app . ?actor_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?actor_label . BIND(IF(LANG(?actor_label) != "", STRLANG(REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", ""), LANG(?actor_label)), REPLACE(STR(?actor_label), "\\s*\\([^)]*\\)", "")) AS ?actor_name) FILTER( LANG(?actor_name) = "en" || LANG(?actor_name) = "" )}

11.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?label WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item .  ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?work lrmoo:R3_is_realised_in ?expression . ?activity crm:P16_used_specific_object ?item ; crm:P2_has_type aat:300054277 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?uri . ?uri crm:P1_is_identified_by ?appellation . ?appellation crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?label. FILTER( LANG(?label) = "en" || LANG(?label) = "" )}

12.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?location_label WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item ; crm:P53_has_former_or_current_location ?location . ?activity crm:P16_used_specific_object ?item ; crm:P2_has_type aat:300054277 ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?conservation_org . ?conservation_org crm:P74_has_current_or_former_residence ?location . ?location crm:P1_is_identified_by ?location_app . ?location_app crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?location_label . }

13.query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?digital_repr WHERE { VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>} ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item ; crm:P130i_features_are_also_found_on ?digital_repr . }

14.query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?existing_model WHERE {VALUES ?item {<<<uri1>>>}   ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item ; crm:P130i_features_are_also_found_on ?3d_model . ?3d_model crm:P130_shows_features_of ?existing_model .}

15.query: PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/aat/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX crmdig: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/extensions/crmdig/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?item ?license_apl ?license_label WHERE { VALUES ?item { <<<uri1>>> } ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item ; crm:P138i_has_representation ?model . OPTIONAL { { ?acquisition crmdig:L1_digitized ?item ; crmdig:L11_had_output ?raw . } UNION { ?item crm:P130i_features_are_also_found_on ?raw . } ?processing crmdig:L10_had_input ?raw ; crmdig:L11_had_output ?rawp . ?modelling crmdig:L10_had_input ?rawp ; crmdig:L11_had_output ?dcho . BIND( IRI(REPLACE(STR(?dcho), "/[0-9][0-9]/[0-9]+$", "/03/1")) AS ?mdl03 ) ?license crm:P2_has_type aat:300435434 ; crm:P67_refers_to ?mdl03 ; crm:P1_is_identified_by ?license_apl ; crm:P70i_is_documented_in ?license_link . ?license_apl crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?license_label . } }
15.content: 3D OBJECT LICENCE – <<>>

16.title:
This is this object’s moment in history.
How crowded was its time?
16.query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?begin ?end WHERE {?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P4_has_time-span ?timespan . ?timespan crm:P82a_begin_of_the_begin ?begin ; crm:P82b_end_of_the_end ?end . }
